TEXT.S: Anthony Bonner sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1968, ryax sa tay 8 nqu tay 6, Anthony Bonner, squliq na p'unro. qyanux na hopa pqwasan biru Anthony Bonner sraral maki Saint Louis University mzyu mari. 2002 kawas,tzyun payat kawas nya qnyat balay mzyu mari nha Utah Jazz.
